paint.shared.io

Class HelperIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • paint.shared.io.HelperIO

  • public final class HelperIO
extends Object
    Utility class providing static helper methods for reading and writing Recording, Square, and Track data in a PAINT experiment directory.

    This class wraps the specialized I/O classes (RecordingTableIO, SquareTableIO, and TrackTableIO) to simplify loading and saving of experiment data.

    Each method performs schema validation and detailed logging, ensuring reliable data integrity across all experiment operations.
